trans-unit.source: Defines a flexible grid area that consists of columns and rows.
trans-unit.target: Definerer et område med fleksible rutenett som består av kolonnene og radene.

trans-unit.source: A Grid contains a collection of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> objects, which are in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Et rutenett inneholder en samling av <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>objekter i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel.Children%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: Columns and rows that are defined within a Grid can take advantage of <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType> sizing to distribute remaining space proportionally.
trans-unit.target: Kolonnene og radene som er definert i et rutenett kan dra nytte av <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType>skalering skal distribueres gjenværende plass proporsjonalt.</xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType>

trans-unit.source: When <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType> is selected as the height or width of a row or column, that column or row receives a weighted proportion of the remaining available space.
trans-unit.target: Når <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType>er valgt som den høyden og bredden på rader og kolonner, kolonne- eller mottar en vektet del av gjenværende ledig plass.</xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType>

trans-unit.source: This is in contrast to <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType>, which distributes space evenly based on the size of the content that is within a column or row.
trans-unit.target: Dette er i forhold til <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType>, som distribuerer plass jevnt basert på størrelsen på innholdet som er i en kolonne eller rad.</xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType>

trans-unit.source: This value is expressed as `*` or `2*` when you use [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Verdien som er angitt som `*` eller `2*` når du bruker [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: In the first case, the row or column would receive one times the available space, while in the second case, the row or column would receive two times the available space, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Det første tilfellet raden eller kolonnen vil motta en ganger tilgjengelig plass, mens i andre fall raden eller i kolonnen vil motta to ganger tilgjengelig plass, og så videre.

trans-unit.source: By combining this technique to proportionally distribute space with a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> value of `Stretch`, it is possible to partition layout space by percentage of screen space.
trans-unit.target: Ved å kombinere denne metoden hvis du vil distribuere proporsjonalt space med en <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>verdien `Stretch`, er det mulig å partisjonen oppsettet plass ved prosent av plass på skjermen.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Grid is the only layout panel that can distribute space in this manner.
trans-unit.target: Rutenett er bare oppsettet panelet som kan distribuere plass på denne måten.

trans-unit.source: By default, rows and columns take up the least amount of space necessary to accommodate the largest content within any cell contained in a given row or column.
trans-unit.target: Som standard ta rader og kolonner minst plass nødvendig for å gi plass til største innholdet i en celle i angitte rader og kolonner.

trans-unit.source: For example, if a column has one cell with a long word like "hippopotamus" contained within it but all the other cells in the column have smaller words like "dog", the width of the column will be the width of the largest word (hippopotamus).
trans-unit.target: For eksempel hvis en kolonne har en celle med et langt ord som "Flodhesten" innenfor den, men alle de andre cellene i kolonnen har mindre ord som "dog", blir bredden på kolonnen bredden på største ordet (Flodhesten).

trans-unit.source: You can precisely position child elements of a Grid by using a combination of the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin%2A> property and alignment properties.
trans-unit.target: Du kan plassere underordnede elementer i et rutenett ved hjelp av en kombinasjon av det <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin%2A>egenskapen og justering egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Margin%2A>

trans-unit.source: Child elements of a Grid are drawn in the order in which they appear in markup or code.
trans-unit.target: Underordnede elementer i et rutenett tegnes i rekkefølgen som de vises i markup eller kode.

trans-unit.source: As a consequence, layered order (also known as z-order) can be achieved when elements share the same coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Navnet, kan lagdelt rekkefølge (også kjent som z-rekkefølgen) oppnås når elementer deler samme koordinatene.

trans-unit.source: Grid and <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table> share some common functionality, but each can be applied in appropriate scenarios to better use its built-in features.
trans-unit.target: Rutenett og <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table>har noen vanlig funksjonalitet, men hver kan brukes i riktig scenarier for å bruke de innebygde funksjonene bedre.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table>

trans-unit.source: Grid adds elements based on a row and column index; <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table> does not.
trans-unit.target: Rutenett legger til elementer som er basert på en rad- og indeksen. <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table>ikke.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table>

trans-unit.source: The Grid element allows layering of content, where more than one element can exist within a single cell.
trans-unit.target: Elementet rutenett tillater lagvise av innhold, der det kan finnes mer enn ett element i én celle.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table> does not support layering.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table>støtter ikke lagvis.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table>

trans-unit.source: Child elements of a Grid can be absolutely positioned relative to the upper-left corner of their "cell" boundaries.
trans-unit.target: Underordnede elementer i et rutenett kan absolutt plasseres i forhold til øverste venstre hjørne av deres "" cellegrensene.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table> does not support this feature.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table>støtter ikke denne funksjonen.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table>

trans-unit.source: Grid also offers more flexible resizing behavior than <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table>.
trans-unit.target: Rutenett tilbyr også mer fleksibel endre størrelse på virkemåte enn <xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table>.</xref:System.Windows.Documents.Table>

trans-unit.source: Grid uses the <xref:System.Windows.GridLength> object to define the sizing characteristics of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>.
trans-unit.target: Rutenettet bruker <xref:System.Windows.GridLength>objektet til å definere skalering-egenskaper av en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition>eller <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinition> </xref:System.Windows.GridLength>

trans-unit.source: For a definition of each unit type, see <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType>.
trans-unit.target: En definisjon av hver enhet, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType>.</xref:System.Windows.GridUnitType>

trans-unit.source: If a child element is added to a column within a Grid, and the column has its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.Width%2A> property set to `Auto`, the child will be measured without restrictions.
trans-unit.target: Hvis et underordnet element legges til en kolonne i et rutenett, og kolonnen har den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.Width%2A>-egenskapen satt til `Auto`, at barnet skal måles uten begrensninger.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition.Width%2A>

trans-unit.source: This behavior can prevent horizontal scroll bars from displaying if a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> is being used, as the child element is measured as unbounded.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan hindre at vannrett Rull stolper vises hvis en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>som brukes, som det underordnede elementet måles som ubegrensede.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: For purposes of display, the child is clipped rather than scrolled.
trans-unit.target: For å vise, barnet er beskåret i stedet rullet.

trans-unit.source: Panel elements do not receive focus by default.
trans-unit.target: Panelet elementer mottar ikke fokus som standard.

trans-unit.source: To compel a panel element to receive focus, set the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil compel et element for panelet skal være fokus, kan du angi den <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Focusable%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Arranges the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: Ordner innholdet i en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"> </xref> elementet.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the size this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref> element should use to arrange its child elements.
trans-unit.target: Angir størrelsen på dette <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"> </xref> elementet skal bruke til å ordne de underordnede elementene.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> that represents the arranged size of this Grid element and its children.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>som representerer ordnet størrelsen på elementet rutenett og de underordnede objektene.

trans-unit.target: ## XAML egenskapen Element Bruk ``` ``` ## XAML verdier *OneOrMoreColumnDefinitions* én eller flere elementer.

trans-unit.source: Each such <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition> becomes a placeholder representing a column in the final grid layout.
trans-unit.target: Hvert eksempel <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>er en plassholder som representerer en kolonne i endelig Rutenettoppsett.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinition>

trans-unit.target: Henter underordnet på den angitte index posisjon.

trans-unit.source: The visual tree must not be modified while this method is called.
trans-unit.target: Visual treet må ikke endres mens denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index position of the desired <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Den nullbaserte indeksen posisjonen for den ønskede <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Henter en opplisting som kan gå logiske underordnede for dette <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>.
trans-unit.target: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator>

trans-unit.source: This property has no default value.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen har ingen standardverdi.

trans-unit.source: Measures the children of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref> in anticipation of arranging them during the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid.ArrangeOverride*> pass.
trans-unit.target: Måler underordnede for et <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"> </xref> de forventer seg å ordne dem under <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid.ArrangeOverride*>pass.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid.ArrangeOverride*>

trans-unit.source: Indicates an upper limit size that should not be exceeded.
trans-unit.target: Angir en øvre grense for størrelse som ikke er overskredet.

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> that represents the required size to arrange child content.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref>som representerer den påkrevde størrelsen på å ordne underordnede innhold.

trans-unit.source: Called when the visual children of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref> element change.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når visual underordnede for et <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"> </xref> elementet endringen.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the visual child that's added.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer visual barnet som er lagt til.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the visual child that's removed.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer visual barnet som er fjernet.

trans-unit.target: Henter en <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.RowDefinitionCollection"> </xref> definert i denne forekomsten av <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"> </xref>.

trans-unit.target: Egenskapsverdi angitt.

trans-unit.source: Returns true if <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinitionCollection"></xref> associated with this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref> is not empty.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer true Hvis <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinitionCollection"> </xref> knyttet til denne forekomsten av <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"> </xref> som ikke er tom.

trans-unit.source: true if <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinitionCollection"></xref> associated with this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref> is not empty; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: SANN hvis <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinitionCollection"> </xref> knyttet til denne forekomsten av <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"> </xref> er ikke tom; ellers, false.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether grid lines are visible within this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om rutenettlinjene skal vises i dette <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Enabling grid lines creates dotted lines around all the elements within a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer rutenettlinjene oppretter linjen rundt alle elementer i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>

trans-unit.source: Only dotted lines are available because this property is intended as a design tool to debug layout problems and is not intended for use in production quality code.
trans-unit.target: Bare linjen er tilgjengelig fordi denne egenskapen skal som et utformingsverktøy Feilsøke problemer i oppsettet og er ikke ment for bruk i produksjon kvalitet kode.

trans-unit.source: If you want lines inside a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>, style the elements within the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> to have borders.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil linjene i en <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>, style elementer i den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>kantlinjer.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if grid lines are visible; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis rutenett er synlige. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid.ShowGridLines*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid.ShowGridLines*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid.ShowGridLines*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Denne typen eller medlemmet støtter det [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastruktur og skal ikke brukes direkte fra koden.

trans-unit.source: An object to add as a child.
trans-unit.target: Et objekt som skal legges til som et barn.

trans-unit.source: This type or member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Denne typen eller medlemmet støtter det [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] infrastruktur og skal ikke brukes direkte fra koden.

trans-unit.source: A string to add to the object.
trans-unit.target: En tekststreng til å legge til objektet.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that represents the total number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> children within this instance of <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som Representer antall <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> underordnede i denne forekomsten av <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Grid"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The visual tree must not be modified during a call to this method.
trans-unit.target: Visual treet må ikke endres under et kall til denne metoden.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Int32> that represents the total number of child <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Int32>som representerer antall underordnede <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> objekter.</xref:System.Int32>

trans-unit.source: The default value is zero.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er null.
